resources.string: Notifications to remind you about your classes but it\'s your wish if you want to attend it or not :)
Download the VITTY extension and app now!\nExtension: https://dscv.it/vitty-extension\nAndroid App: https://dscv.it/vitty-app
2. Log in with the same Google Account as shown above.
3. Upload a screenshot of your timetable.
\u25CB Ensure that the screenshot is taken directly from VTOP. It should fit in one single image (Zoom in/out to achieve this).
\u25CB DO NOT upload a screenshot that has been compressed/ sent through any means such as Whatsapp, Instagram.
4. Wait for about a minute for the ML Model to fetch your Slots.
5. Review them in the Chrome Extension.
\u25CB Individual slot data can be edited by clicking on the edit button next to the corresponding slot.
\u25CB If unsatisfied with various slot values, click on upload timetable manually as text. Copy your complete timetable from VTOP in text format.
BRAVO! That\'s it. You are all set to receive push notifications for all your classes on the app as well as chrome.
In addition to this, you can have a sneak peek at your upcoming classes via the Widget.
